title: 1975년 United States v. Carlos Leyba 사건
summary: 미국 USA, Federal 법원 판결 사건. 사건명: United States v. Carlos Leyba. 판결일: 1975-02-18. 법원: Court of Appeals for the Tenth Circuit.
description:
## 사건 정보

**사건명**: UNITED STATES of America, Plaintiff-Appellee, v. Carlos LEYBA, Defendant-Appellant
**판결일**: 1975-02-18
**법원**: Court of Appeals for the Tenth Circuit
**관할**: USA, Federal

**판사**: Doyle, Hill, Smith, Talbot

## 변호인

Winston Roberts-Hohl, Federal Public Defender, Albuquerque, N. M., for defendant-appellant., Richard J. Smith, Asst. U. S. Atty., Albuquerque, N. M. (Victor R. Ortega, U. S. Atty., Albuquerque, N. M., on the brief), for plaintiff-appellee.

## 인용

- 504 F.2d 441

## 판결문 요약

504 F.2d 441
    UNITED STATES of America, Plaintiff-Appellee,v.Carlos LEYBA, Defendant-Appellant.
    No. 74-1037.
    United States Court of Appeals, Tenth Circuit.
    Argued Aug 20, 1974.Decided Oct. 24, 1974, Certiorari Denied Feb. 18, 1975, See95 S. Ct. 1139.
    
      1
      Winston Roberts-Hohl, Federal Public Defender, Albuquerque, N.M., for defendant-appellant.
    
    
      2
      Richard J. Smith, Asst. U.S. Atty., Albuquerque, N.M.  (Victor R. Ortega, U.S. Atty., Albuquerque, N.M., on the brief), for plaintiff-appellee.
    
    
      3
      Before HILL and DOYLE, Circuit Judges, and TALBOT SMITH,* Senior District Judge.
    
    
      4
      TALBOT SMITH, Senior District Judge.
    
    
      5
      The appellant herein was convicted by a jury of violations of 18 U.S.C. 2113(a), (b) and (d), hereinafter summarized, arising out of the robbery at gunpoint of the First National Bank of Santa Fe, New Mexico.  His principal defense was alibi, rejected by the jury.  He argues on appeal that 'it was an abuse of discretion for the Court to deny (his) motion for a new trial,' and objects, as well, to the court's admission of certain evidence going to his physical characteristics and to his photographic identification.
    
    
      6
      Viewed most favorably to the Government, the evidence established that before noon on October 15, 1973, two individuals, one of whom bore 'a very strong resemblance' to the defendant, were observed by one Miguel Romero don...
